CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 16, 1955, pg. 11 reads: "Mr. and Mrs. Risher Watts Jr....pretty home wedding." Portion of accompanying article reads: "Miss Peggy Greenlee, daughter of Mr. and Mrs. J.A. Greenlee of 810 Bryn Mawr Road, became the bride of Risher Watts Jr., July 2 at 6:30 at the home of the bride parents.   The Rev. Charles Foggie officiated at the service."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of two men, including groom Risher Watts Jr., and two women, including bride Peggy Greenlee wearing light colored sleeveless dress and netted headpiece, cutting three tiered wedding cake in home of Mr. and Mrs. J.A. Greenlee, 810 Bryn Mawr Road
